verses.verse: Michtam <S%H4387><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Preserve <S%H8104><s%> me, O God: <S%H410><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in thee do I put my trust. <S%H2620><s%>
O my soul, thou hast said <S%H559><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> art my Lord: <S%H136><s%> my goodness <S%H2896><s%> extendeth not <S%H1077><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> thee;
But to the saints <S%H6918><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and to the excellent, <S%H117><s%> in whom is all <S%H3605><s%> my delight. <S%H2656><s%>

Their sorrows <S%H6094><s%> shall be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> that hasten <S%H4116><s%> after another <S%H312><s%> god: their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> of blood <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> will I not <S%H1077><s%> offer, <S%H5258><s%> nor <S%H1077><s%> take up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> my lips. <S%H8193><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is the portion <S%H4521><s%> of mine inheritance <S%H2506><s%> and of my cup: <S%H3563><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> maintainest <S%H8551><s%> my lot. <S%H1486><s%>
The lines <S%H2256><s%> are fallen <S%H5307><s%> unto me in pleasant <S%H5273><s%> places; yea, <S%H637><s%> I have <S%H5921><s%> a goodly <S%H8231><s%> heritage. <S%H5159><s%>

I will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H834><s%> hath given me counsel: <S%H3289><s%> my reins <S%H3629><s%> also <S%H637><s%> instruct <S%H3256><s%> me in the night seasons. <S%H3915><s%>

I have set <S%H7737><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me: because <S%H3588><s%> he is at my right hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3225><s%> I shall not <S%H1077><s%> be moved. <S%H4131><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> is glad, <S%H8055><s%> and my glory <S%H3519><s%> rejoiceth: <S%H1523><s%> my flesh <S%H1320><s%> also <S%H637><s%> shall rest <S%H7931><s%> in hope. <S%H983><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou wilt not <S%H3808><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in hell; <S%H7585><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> wilt thou suffer <S%H5414><s%> thine Holy One <S%H2623><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> corruption. <S%H7845><s%>

Thou wilt show <S%H3045><s%> me the path <S%H734><s%> of life: <S%H2416><s%> in <S%H854><s%> thy presence <S%H6440><s%> is fullness <S%H7648><s%> of joy; <S%H8057><s%> at thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> there are pleasures <S%H5273><s%> forevermore. <S%H5331><s%>
